General.Name: Value Valves Co Ltd
General.Description: Value Valves Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, inspection, and marketing of valves in Taiwan. It provides butterfly, check, damper, ball, globe, gate, and customized valves. The company's products are used in petroleum and petrochemical products, steel, shipbuilding, energy, water treatment, paper, air-conditioning, electronic, and other industrial fields. Value Valves Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 9, Chung-Shan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 236
